name: OC_MarkdownView
summary: MarkdownView is a markdown render like swift-markdown-ui but write in ObjectiveC.
description: MarkdownView is simple and easy to use markdown render view for iOS. which is writen in Objective-C. And support most of the GFM markdown style.The whole project is referencing the [swift-markdown-ui]( https://github.com/gonzalezreal/swift-markdown-ui). thanks for the author. And I am just a little helper to express the swift-markdown-ui in ObjectiveC.
